message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects the urgency for me to settle due to the higher inflation rate I face.
I believe a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation rates.  Let's get this done quickly, as we both lose money with each passing round.

Bob, your offer doesn't reflect the significant difference in our inflation rates. I'm proposing a compromise that still acknowledges your position but secures a more sustainable outcome for me. Time is valuable, but so is a fair resolution.
